short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smash Medium's clap button the maximum number of times (50) in 1 click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of clicking and clicking, clicking and holding, to show your support for articles you enjoy on Medium? What a hassle! Introducing the thunderclap. Now you can clap the max number of times in 1 click. Enjoy!
